KitKat2::
She smiled and rested her head on his shoulder as they walked. 
She straightened up as she entered the station. "What's going on 
Mouse?"

DarkMouse::
She hated being called just mouse. She only let KitKat and 
Quickstrike get away with it. She wouldn't let anyone else call her 
that, or they'd find thier head on thier lap, severed from thier body.
"Well, the scanners show that there is a massive attack on the 
maximal base CybertronFire. From the signature readings, it looks 
like there are a few good predacons out there that we might want to 
enlist. Or have us join them.  After all, the more we are means the 
more we have to stomp the maximals with right? So, whatcha want to do 
there commander?" she said, looking at Drillbit with a evil grin. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He got up and walked with her.
> "You bet we will, love. We have to make up for lost time."
> He then responded to Dark Mouse, "Ok, we are on are way."
> As he walked, he put his arm around the shoulders of KitKat.
> "I love you."
